Files Headings

_customDefaultsMerge.js

 
var baseMerge = require('./_baseMerge'),
    isObject = require('./isObject');

Used by _.defaultsDeep to customize its _.merge use to merge source objects into destination objects that are passed thru.

Params
objValue The destination value.
srcValue The source value.
key string The key of the property to merge.
object Object The parent object of objValue.
source Object The parent object of srcValue.
[stack] Object Tracks traversed source values and their merged counterparts. 
function customDefaultsMerge(objValue, srcValue, key, object, source, stack) {
  if (isObject(objValue) && isObject(srcValue)) {

Recursively merge objects and arrays (susceptible to call stack limits).

 
    stack.set(srcValue, objValue);
    baseMerge(objValue, srcValue, undefined, customDefaultsMerge, stack);
    stack['delete'](srcValue);
  }
  return objValue;
}

module.exports = customDefaultsMerge;
